mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_no AS noticeNo, n.notice_title AS noticeTitle, e.employee_id AS employeeId, n.createdate, n.updatedate FROM notice n JOIN employee e ON n.employee_no = e.employee_no ORDER BY n.notice_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage};

SELECT n.notice_no AS noticeNo, n.notice_title AS noticeTitle, e.employee_id AS employeeId, n.notice_content AS noticeContent, n.createdate AS createdate, n.updatedate AS updatedate FROM notice n JOIN employee e ON n.employee_no = e.employee_no WHERE n.notice_no = #{noticeNo};
